amendment.description: Page 12, line 13, insert after "goods or services" the following: "(including safety, professional, or administrative services directly related to health care)".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Sessions.
